forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Rain And Snow
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain and snow between 3am and 4am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 34. South southeast wind around 12 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Snow then Light Rain Likely
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow before 10am, then rain likely. Mostly cloudy. High near 39, with temperatures falling to around 37 in the afternoon. South southeast wind 7 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.
